source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT CAST(ISNULL([LastRunDateTime], '1900-01-01') AS date) AS LastRunDateTime FROM [System].[Config]  WHERE setting = 'oa_nltrans'
SELECT CAST(ISNULL([LastRunDateTime], '1900-01-01') AS date) AS LastRunDateTime FROM [System].[Config]  WHERE setting = 'oa_pctrans'
SELECT CAST(ISNULL([LastRunDateTime], '1900-01-01') AS date) AS LastRunDateTime FROM [System].[Config]  WHERE setting = 'oa_podetail'
SELECT CAST(ISNULL([LastRunDateTime], '1900-01-01') AS date) AS LastRunDateTime FROM [System].[Config]  WHERE setting = 'tops_jobs'
